data.title: A notch above average fast food
data.text: I think this place is wonderful!  They focus on healthy eating and it tastes really good.  One of my favorite places to go.  Nearly all the workers are teenagers, but they do a wonderful job.  It's an overall great place.  Way better than most fast food places!  Highly recommend!

data.title: Good fast casual option in Woodbury
data.text: Noodles & Company is always a good fast casual option for a quick meal and the location in Woodbury is no different.  It’s in the midst of a strip mall with lots of different dining options and has both indoor/outdoor seating.  We really appreciated the option to order smaller versions of all the dishes and like the mix of Asian/Italian dishes on the menu.

data.title: Great alternative to burgers or subs
data.text: This restaurant has a good variety of noodle dishes and salads, try the spicy Korean noodle dish it was excellent with pot stickers or cheesy garlic bread, very affordable, definitely worth going back too

data.title: Simple, tasty and affordable
data.text: Noodles & Company offers a simple, yet flexible menu of various noodles/pastas. Tasty food which fills you up - and a good price. Make sure you grab some of their delicious flat bread as it complements the noodles quite well. Marinara sauce is also worth trying out.

data.title: Fast and tasty.
data.text: Good for a quick yet tasty meal. We ate here before running Rangar. Filling but easy on stomach. Typical noodles items. HAve had pretty much the same experience at all of them.

data.title: Kids love this place
data.text: Both of my kids ordered the macaroni and cheese, and loved it. I took a bite and couldn't taste the appeal. I found the noodles and cheese dish very bland and without much cheese. I myself enjoyed the potstickers and garlic cheese bread which I found both very good and tasty. They have a little bit of everything, from pasta dishes to soups and salads, appetizers and cookies and bars. The soda machine is located at an odd place- it's in a walkway, and there is no place for the line to form, so it's a bit of a jumbled mess when people are waiting (only one person can use at a time), and people are trying to get by to deliver food and get to tables. There is something for everyone and we will be back!

data.title: "Quick and Delicious"
data.text: After shopping my daughter and I were looking for a quick lunch.  We chose "Noodles & company.......fantastic choice!   We had the Wisconsin 3cheese Mac & Cheese with bacon toppings.  It was very delicious and only took minutes to get.  Upon leaving we saw a couple trying to choose where to eat...we immediately suggested this restaurant and they went there too!

data.title: It's a chain, but OK
data.text: The staff at the Woodbury Noodles and Company is competent.  The food is fine, but nothing extraordinary; various pastas are available, cooked with the chain recipes.  The dining facility is clean and service is good.

data.title: Nice quick and clean place for a good meal
data.text: My two favorites, the Japanese Pan noodles and the Bangkok Curry are always fantastic but I've had almost every dish on the menu and have never been disappointed. The new offerings on the menu, delicious flatbreads are really good if you are looking for a lighter meal that won't weigh you down. They also have super deals if you join their reward program.

data.title: Just Noodles
data.text:
Nothing great, about what you would expect.  
Pasta was cooked well.  Staff was courteous and prompt.  Everything tastes like it was prepared somewhere else and warmed.  But I never expected it to taste like it was made from scratch, it is fast food after all.

data.title: Grandchildren Love This
data.text: There is something for every taste available.  Pleasing the grandchildren is easy.  I, personally, love the buttered noodles with herbs and Parmesan chicken.

data.title: My kids love this!
data.text: When we are on the go we often get the kids dinner here. They love the pesto cavetapi without veggies.  One adds shrimp and the other the Parmesan Chicken.  This noodles location seems to be very consistent with its quality!

data.title: Quick Family Meal
data.text: Great place where you can order almost anything to satisfy a noodle craving. Ordered for our family of 5. Dishes ranged from mac and cheese, to pad thai to stroganoff. The dishes served were fine, sadly nothing memorable. I think all dishes were dry, not enough sauce and definitely not enough spice. Despite this experience, I will try Noodles and Company again.

data.title: Great for quick dinner
data.text: My family loves Noodles (especially my kids).  They almost always order the Pesto Cavitapi and my wife the Penne Rosa.  Both are good and the Parmesan Crusted Chicken is a nice addition to the pasta....

data.title: Good food, had a coupon--did take-out
data.text: We had a coupon so checked it out.  We had the Mac and Cheese, Steak Stroganoff and Bangkok Curry with pork.  Everything was great. It was busy so it was a little longer to order and wait for take-out.  It is confusing ordering because it is the same place or take-out and in-house.  In the afternoon,t he sun comes in the window blinding the poor workers.  They should think about improving the layout of ordering, take-out people get bunched up around people eating in and you don't know where to stand.

data.title: Great food for the price
data.text: Love everything on the menu, I've worked my way through it over the years and I can honestly say there isn't anything on the menu I didn't enjoy.

data.title: Very Good Choice for Noodle Dishes
data.text: Noodles is always a great choice for creative pasta dishes. I have been to several Noodles locations and always find them to be great choices for lunch or for a dinner that is not too heavy. This location was pleasantly located in a relatively recently developed shopping area in Woodbury. The layout was a bit unusual for a Noodles but was quite nice. My colleague had the Pasta Fresca and I had the Tomato Basil soup with a Med Sandwich. It was all very good. The service was friendly and efficient and the prices were very good. If you would like to have a lunch or a light dinner, this is a great place to do so.

data.title: Good Food
data.text: Noodles is one of the best values for a quick meal in woodbury. Always super fresh food I highly recommend

data.title: Love the variety
data.text: Great spot for quality and flavorful food. Anything from butter noodles, Wisconsin Mac and Cheese (kid's fav) to Mediterranean and Thai. They recently put in the new Coke Fountain with countless combinations. Love the Black Passion iced tea. Prices are a little high but you get what you pay for! I have been to this Noodles location about once a month since we have lived in the area and have never had anything but excellent results.

data.title: Good Food
data.text: I am not a noodle person but decided to give this a try.  I was very pleasantly surprised with the menu options - meat, wine, and desserts.  The sauces were tasty and you had more than a cream sauce options.  The price was a little more than I thought but overall this is a very nice place with good food.
